001package net.tnemc.plugincore.core.connections.economy;
002
003import java.math.BigDecimal;
004
005/**
006 * Created by creatorfromhell.
007 *
008 * The New Plugin Core Minecraft Server Plugin
009 *
010 * All rights reserved.
011 *
012 * Some Details about what is acceptable use of this software:
013 *
014 * This project accepts user contributions.
015 *
016 * Direct redistribution of this software is not allowed without written permission. However,
017 * compiling this project into your software to utilize it as a library is acceptable as long
018 * as it's not used for commercial purposes.
019 *
020 * Commercial usage is allowed if a commercial usage license is bought and verification of the
021 * purchase is able to be provided by both parties.
022 *
023 * By contributing to this software you agree that your rights to your contribution are handed
024 * over to the owner of the project.
025 */
026public interface EconomyConnector {
027
028  /**
029   * Used to create an economy account
030   * @param identifier The identifier of the account. This could be a username or a UUID valid
031   * String.
032   * @param world The world to create the account for.
033   * @return True if the account was created.
034   */
035  boolean createAccount(String identifier, String world);
036
037  /**
038   * Used to delete an economy account
039   * @param identifier The identifier of the account. This could be a username or a UUID valid
040   * String.
041   * @param world The world to delete the account from.
042   * @return True if the account was deleted.
043   */
044  boolean deleteAccount(String identifier, String world);
045
046  /**
047   * @return The global default currency.
048   */
049  String getCurrency();
050
051  /**
052   *
053   * @param world The world to use for the search.
054   * @return The default currency for the world.
055   */
056  String getCurrency(String world);
057
058  /**
059   * Used to check if the specified currency exists.
060   * @param currency The name of the currency to look for.
061   * @return True if the currency exists, otherwise false.
062   */
063  boolean hasCurrency(String currency);
064
065  /**
066   * Used to check if the specified currency exists in the specific world.
067   * @param currency The name of the currency to look for.
068   * @param world The name of the world to use in the search
069   * @return True if the currency exists, otherwise false.
070   */
071  boolean hasCurrency(String currency, String world);
072
073  BigDecimal getHoldings(String identifier, String world);
074
075  BigDecimal getHoldings(String identifier, String world, String currency);
076
077  boolean hasHoldings(String identifier, String world, String currency, BigDecimal amount);
078
079  void addHoldings(String identifier, String world, String currency, BigDecimal amount);
080
081  void setHoldings(String identifier, String world, String currency, BigDecimal amount);
082
083  void removeHoldings(String identifier, String world, String currency, BigDecimal amount);
084}
